code: import axios from'axios';export var getAllInvoice=function getAllInvoice(){return axios.get("/api/invoices/all");};export var getInvoiceById=function getInvoiceById(id){return axios.get("/api/invoices",{data:id});};export var deleteInvoice=function deleteInvoice(invoice){return axios.post("/api/invoices/delete",invoice);};export var addInvoice=function addInvoice(invoice){return axios.post("/api/invoices/add",invoice);};export var updateInvoice=function updateInvoice(invoice){return axios.post("/api/invoices/update",invoice);};
